resources.string:
Your Reservation has
Accomplished
Successfully.

You have Planned
for a Trip, with

Booking a Trip with Maximal Tours\nYou agree that you have read and accepted all Terms and Conditions of this agreement as a binding contract between Maximal Tours and Events LLC (aka, Maximal Tours and MT ) and you, the trip participant upon submission of your online booking form and payment of your trip deposit. In addition, Maximal Tours will supply and requires a duly signed Release and Waiver form.
Trip Reservation and Deposit\nA non- refundable deposit is required(according to the application) to establish and hold a reservation.
Cancellation Fee and Refunds\nIf you provide written notice of your intention to cancel the trip Up to 42nd day before the start of the journey: 20 % Up to 30th day before the start of the journey: 30 % Up to 15th day before the start of the journey: 40 % Up to 07th day before the start of the journey: 60 % Up to 03rd day before the start of the journey: 80 % Up to 02nd day before the start of the journey: 80 % From the 2nd day before the start of the trip or no show 85 %
No refunds will be made to participants who drop out after the trip has begun. No exceptions to this policy will be made for any reason.

1. Must Carry latest Covid-19 dose Vaccination Certificate 2. Must carry enough Cloths but overall weight of your luggage must be less than 20Kg 3. Aadhar Card, Passport size Photograph 4. Toothpaste, Brush, Towel,etc.
